report.title: MNHNL Observations in a parent sample
report.description: Form Internal Report: Used by the Occurrence List grid to retrieve the occurrences associated with a parent sample. Most recently entered is top of list.
report.query: SELECT o.id, s.entered_sref, s.entered_sref_system, ST_AsText(s.geom) as geom, lttl.taxon, (select CASE int_value WHEN 0 THEN 'No'::text ELSE 'Yes'::text END AS territorial from occurrence_attribute_values oav where oav.occurrence_id = o.id and oav.deleted = FALSE and oav.occurrence_attribute_id = #territorial_attr_id#) as territorial, (select int_value from occurrence_attribute_values oav where oav.occurrence_id = o.id and oav.deleted = FALSE and oav.occurrence_attribute_id = #count_attr_id#) as count FROM samples s JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=s.id JOIN list_taxa_taxon_lists lttl ON lttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id WHERE s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND o.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id = #parent_id# #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for:
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
